name: Alien Attraction
description:
** ATTENTION **

 

NEW MISSION (#6394)

Due to a shortage of metal on our planet, you MUST visit a planet called... "Earth" and collect as much metal as possible!

To Aid in the collection of metal, you will be assigned a heavy duty C15 Magnet capable of automatic scaling! 

 

** ATTENTION **

Game made for ScoreSpace Jam #18. All art and assets were made during the Jam.

Leaderboard created with LootLocker.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move in any direction. 

Left mouse click in the direction you wish to release your magnet to collect scrap.

Space / Left Shift for a small boost.

Credits: 

Programmer: Jordan Robinson

 Artist: Celine Williams (IG: C.T.W.Illustrations)
